law.full_text:
RECORDER ADMINISTERS. (Amended by Ord. No. 166,976, Eff. 7/3/91, Oper. 7/1/91.)
The County Recorder shall administer this article in conformity with the provisions of Part 6.7 of Division 2 of the Revenue and Taxation Code and the provisions of any County ordinance adopted pursuant thereto. The Director of Finance of the City of Los Angeles is authorized to negotiate and enter into a contract with the County of Los Angeles or one of its officials for the administration of this article and payment to the County for its costs of administration.
law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
RECORDER ADMINISTERS. (§ 21.9.9)
RECORDER ADMINISTERS. (Amended by Ord. No. 166,976, Eff. 7/3/91, Oper. 7/1/91.) The County Recorder shall administer this article in conformity with the provisions of Part 6.7 of Division 2 of the Revenue and Taxation Code and the provisions of any County ordinance adopted pursuant thereto. The Director of Finance of the City of Los Angeles is authorized to negotiate and enter into a contract with the County of Los Angeles or one of its officials for the administration of this article and payment to the County for its costs of administration.
